items.content_html: The project is a React-based shopping cart. application.Each product displayed with its name, price, and an "Add to cart" button. The application is modualr,testable, and maintainable, following best practices for React development. It doesn't use a database, making it lightweight and portable.
items.title: FutureSwag/Shooping-cart: The project is a React-based shopping cart. application.Each product displayed with its name, price, and an "Add to cart" button. The application is modualr,testable, and maintainable, following best practices for React development. It doesn't use a database, making it lightweight and portable.
